import React, { useEffect, Fragment } from "react" import {useMhot} from "../store/action/index" import { useSelector } from "react-redux" export default function MHotMusic(){ let state = useSelector((state)=>{ return state.MhotReducer }) let getData = useMhot() useEffect(()=>{ getData("/top/list?idx=1") },[]) console.log(state) let data = state.data.playlist return(
